{{Description|"Eh? Which one of these is actually Yuegui, you ask? Aren't they all Yuegui?"}}
'''Moonjade Descent''' is [[Yaoyao]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|energy frame|7}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet">GenshinAcademy: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iLUT8Tafwih3RZbNlA59w6-x5NQdgPvsMc86b7W92DQ/edit#gid=0 Elemental Burst Frame Tests]</ref>
* {{TalentNote|cooldown frame|1}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet" />
* Yuegui: Jumping Mode throws 1 radish every second.
* Adeptal Legacy state spawns 1 Yuegui: Jumping Mode every second.
* Each Yuegui spawned by this skill will [[snapshot]] Yaoyao's stats individually when they spawn.
* Each Yuegui randomly selects targets within a cylindrical targeting zone with a radius of '''8m''' and a height of '''10m'''.
* Characters do not need to be within the explosion radius of a White Jade Radish spawned by this skill in order to be healed.
* When the radishes land, hit a character, or hit an enemy, they make a noise that can be heard by enemies and [[wildlife]] and may therefore [[startle]] them.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|ascension|1|Starscatter|character=Yaoyao|talent=Moonjade Descent}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Innocent}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Winsome}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Compassionate}}
